overview: Adapted from the Fannie Hurst story of the same name, Mannequin is the story of Joan Herrick, kidnapped in infancy from her wealthy parents and raised by a slatternly slum woman.  The film is still extant.
tagline: Beautiful girls and gowns in a throbbing human interest story of "Humoresque" appeal by the same author.
title: Mannequin
